Package index

All functions

annihilate_factors()
Regress factors out of exposures and outcome
coef(<susie>)
Extract regression coefficients from susie fit
compute_ss()
Compute sufficient statistics for susie.
estimate_priors_EM()
cTWAS EM algorithm to optimize priors
famr_susie()
Factor-Augmented Mendelian Randomization with SuSiE (FAMR-Susie)
gather_sumstats()
Gather summary statistics for exposures
gather_sumstats_from_dat()
Gather summary statistics for exposures from R objects
generate_factors()
Generate factors for FAMR-Susie
get_results()
Run final Susie-RSS regression and return results
gfa_factor_prune_full()
Prune GFA factors associated with only one exposure
impute_exposure_corrs()
Form correlation matrix of all variables
ld_prune_famr()
LD clump SNPs in a locus
learn_lambda()
Learn regularization parameters for Susie-RSS weight learning
learn_weights()
Learn weights of SNP effects on exposures and factors
learn_wts_precomp_merge()
Learn weights for SNPs, compute values for Z and R, merge data across loci
merge_ld()
Merge LD for a locus into overall LD matrix
merge_outcome()
Merge outcome and exposure summary statistics
merge_sumstats()
Merge sumstats for a locus into overall sumstats
precompute_zxy()
Precompute values for Z-scores and R for this locus
predict(<susie>)
Predict outcomes or extract coefficients from susie fit.
prune_and_merge()
Wrapper function to clump and merge SNPs
read_vcf()
Read summary statistics from a VCF file
read_y_gwas()
Read in outcome trait summary statistics
run_gfa_full()
Run GFA for factor analysis
run_modified_ctwas()
Run cTWAS-style regression framework
run_susie_with_priors()
Run Susie-RSS with cTWAS-inferred priors
subset_sumstats()
Subset summary statistics objects
susie() susie_suff_stat()
Sum of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression

susie_init_coef()
